name: Flippin' Fours
description:
A fresh spin on a classic game. Flippin' Fours adds the ability to rotate the board instead of dropping a piece. Upon rotation, the pieces will fall with gravity. Get 4 of the same color in a row to win! If two 4-in-a-rows are completed at once, it's a tie (unless one player have more than 4 in a row or possibly multiple concurrent 4-in-a-rows.) It's more difficult than it sounds!

WARNING: VERY UNPOLISHED

How to play:

  1. Launch the game and wait for it to connect to the server.
  2. Type a password in the upper text field and click the Create button.
  3. Tell you friend (or enemy) to type the password in the lower text field and click the Join button.
  4. Click above the board to drop a piece or rotate the board with the buttons on the left and right.
